import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import "./App.css" import Table from "./Table" let displayTable = true let randomID = Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000) const Form = () => { const initialValues = { select: false, id: "", firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", telNumber: "", cover: "", date: "", time: "" } // const [firtName, setFisrtName] = useState("") const [values, setValues] = useState(initialValues) const [bookingList, setBookingList] = useState([]) const onChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target setValues({ ...values, [name]: value }) } const submitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault() setValues(initialValues) id = randomID setBookingList(bookingList.concat(values)) displayTable = false } // console.log(h2) // for localstorage useEffect(() => { if (localStorage.getItem("bookings")) { setBookingList(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("bookings"))) } }, []) useEffect(() => { localStorage.setItem("bookings", JSON.stringify(bookingList)) }, [bookingList]) return (

{randomID}

{displayTable &&

NO NEW BOOKING ADDED

} {!displayTable && } ) } export default Form
